bill.title: Licenses; may be suspended if licensee is delinquent in paying a finally determined tax liability.
bill.description: An Act To Require All Licensing Entities To Provide The Department Of Revenue Certain Information For Use In The Enforcement And Collection Of Finally Determined Tax Liabilities And To Authorize The Department To Utilize This Information To Determine If A Licensee Is Delinquent On Paying A Finally Determined Tax Liability; To Provide For Notice To The Licensee Of The Delinquency; To Provide The Actions That A Licensee May Take Upon Receiving Such Notice; To Authorize The Department Of Revenue To Negotiate With A Licensee To Establish A Payment Plan; To Provide That If The Licensee Has Not Entered Into A Payment Plan Within 90 Days After The Notice, The Department Of Revenue Must Notify The Applicable Licensing Entity To Suspend The Licensee's License And The Licensing Entity Shall Suspend The License; To Provide The Procedure For The Appeal Of Such Suspensions; To Provide For Reinstatement Of A Suspended License Upon The Licensing Entity Being Notified By The Department Of Revenue That The Licensee No Longer Has A Delinquent Finally Determined Tax Liability Or That The Licensee Has Entered Into A Payment Plan With The Department; To Authorize Licensing Entities To Impose A Fee For The Reinstatement Of A License Suspended Under This Act; To Amend Sections 37-3-2, 49-7-27, 49-15-325, 63-1-51, 63-1-216, 73-1-29, 73-1-31, 73-1-33, 73-2-16, 73-3-321, 73-3-327, 73-3-329, 73-3-331, 73-3-335, 73-4-19, 73-4-25, 73-5-25, 73-6-19, 73-7-27, 73-9-61, 73-9-65, 73-10-21, 73-11-57, 73-13-37, 73-13-93, 73-14-35, 73-14-39, 73-15-29, 73-17-15, 73-19-23, 73-19-45, 73-21-101, 73-21-103, 73-23-59, 73-23-63, 73-23-64, 73-24-25, 73-24-27, 73-25-27, 73-25-29, 73-27-13, 73-27-16, 73-29-31, 73-29-39, 73-30-21, 73-31-21, 73-33-11, 73-34-35, 73-34-43, 73-35-21, 73-35-25, 73-36-33, 73-38-27, 73-38-29, 73-42-13, 73-43-14, 73-53-17, 73-53-23, 73-53-25, 73-55-19, 73-57-31, 73-59-13, 73-63-43, 73-73-31, 73-75-19, 83-18-3 And 83-39-15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; And For Related Purposes.
